text: Jean-Lou Bigot (born 22 April 1966) is a French equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Maine-et-Loire
title: Jean-Lou Bigot
